summary: Diff implements the homepage landing hero logo swap and adds substantial podcast show/episode UI plus an admin podcasts tab, along with backend stable-state migration scaffolding. However, the diff also includes multiple unrelated admin/artist/fee/verification changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must enforce that only the show owner can add episodes to that show.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend adds episode creation UI and query hooks, but the diff summary does not provide evidence of backend authorization checks for episode creation (e.g., explicit owner check/guard in backend/main.mo). Because backend/main.mo is truncated, this cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Non-admin users cannot access admin podcast submissions views.
missing_requirements.reason: Admin UI for podcast submissions is added, and AdminDashboard includes a Podcasts tab, but the diff summary does not show any explicit role-guarding logic for the podcast submissions view itself. If access control exists elsewhere, it is not evidenced here.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified admin fee management UI (distribution fee and annual maintenance fee)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is focused on homepage logo + podcast submissions workflow; fee management features are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Artist management enhancements (search, edit dialog, verification badge mapping)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; unrelated to logo/podcast requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin user role management changes including user deletion workflow/alerts
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest did not ask for role/user deletion updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Verification management UI enhancements (status tabs, expiry day updates, badge expiry computation)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside the homepage logo and podcast workflow scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Song submissions admin list download functionality/toasts and other behavior changes
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly scopes admin changes to adding a separate podcasts section, not altering music submissions admin behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Podcast show artwork upload requirement added in UI/data model
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 specifies show fields (title, type, description, category, language) but does not request show-level artwork; the diff adds artwork to PodcastShow and makes it required in the show creation form.
